title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI client for Ollama written in Rust; offers REPL & chat sessions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s sidebar.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot template pre-wired to Ollama backend; deploy on Vercel in minutes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client for Ollama with strongly-typed models and built-in streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama with CPU/GPU images and WebUI.

title: ollama-model-librarian
summary: CLI utility to curate and share custom Ollama Modelfiles across teams.

title: ollama-gui-electron
summary: Lightweight Electron desktop client for Ollama with markdown rendering.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rust-sdk
summary: Unofficial Rust SDK published to crates.io with async/await support.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Experimental Zig client for Ollama demonstrating HTTP streaming in Zig 0.12.
